attributes.action: Keep under 18 travel free during school hours.
attributes.additional_details: By removing free travel, many families will struggle to afford to send their children to school; which could put their vital education at risk. School is already a struggle for many families, as buying school textbooks, uniform, paying for lunch and trips is already a burden upon them. Therefore, by adding on a new expense for families to worry about, this defeats the concept of free education for all!
attributes.background: Do not suspend free travel during school hours ,as this will affect thousands of hardworking students and their family’s daily lives.
